DOC.brief_summary: Premenopausal woman symptomatic uterine fibroid randomize either Proellex 25mg 50mg placebo one treatment cycle ( four month ) . Safety effectiveness 50 mg versus placebo , 25mg placebo analyze .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Safety Efficacy ProellexÂ® ( CDB-4124 ) Premenopausal Women With Symptomatic Uterine Fibroids
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects document uterine fibroid , screen UFS-QOL severity score least 40 , meet eligibility criterion enrol study . Following screen pre-treatment endometrial biopsy , subject assess monthly four ( 4 ) month double-blinded treatment phase . The study duration approximately six month , comprise one-month screening period , 4 month treatment period one month follow-up period . Subjects ' blood drawn fast state obtain pre-dose trough ( PK ) level study drug study drug dosing/dispensation visit determine potential drug accumulation .
DOC.criteria: Speak , read understand English Spanish ; Not undergone hysterectomy , uterine arterial embolization endometrial ablation therapy ( previous myomectomy acceptable ) cause surgical intervention uterine fibroid ( e.g . hysterectomy , myomectomy , uterine arterial embolization ) plan anticipate study ; One uterine fibroid must identifiable measurable transvaginal ultrasound ; Menstrual cycle last 24 36 day ; History excessive menstrual bleeding ; Negative urine pregnancy test screening . Six month ( immediately prior Screening Visit ) without menstrual period ; Prior hysterectomy ; Prior bilateral oophorectomy ; Pregnant lactate female woman attempt expect become pregnant time study ; Documented endometriosis , active pelvic inflammatory disease ( PID ) , platelet dysfunction , Von Willebrand 's Disease ; Any history diagnosis gynecological cancer cervical dysplasia grade include atypical squamous cell undetermined significance ( ASCUS ) associate Human Papilloma Virus ( HPV ) ; Subject diagnose suspect carcinoma breast , reproductive organ organ system ; Subject know active infection HIV , Hepatitis A , B C , Gonorrhea , Chlamydia previous history autoimmune disease positive serum antinuclear antibody .
